name: LILT
description: LILT is a game set in mysterious locations and complexes. You play an advanced prototype with technology that allows for unique movement. Players must utilize the mechanics to explore and traverse the often precarious environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP2 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8800 or ATI 2900 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
